title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so. Instead, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. This issue prevents users from selecting any other item on their first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior:
Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior:
The selected item should be highlighted and remain selected in the outline view on the first attempt to select it.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view at least twice.
3. Notice that the second time the label item is selected, it can be selected successfully.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view at least twice.
3. Observe that the first attempt to select an item fails and the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Repeat the selection process and notice that the second time the label item is selected, it can be selected successfully.
